message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $60 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $70 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go as low as $70. My final offer is $85.  Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $80, so I'll offer $82.50 for the product.
